Articles.Content:
I got a question, with these mods I have an increase of around 1,6 gb ram:

 

Is the 1,6 gb increase with these mods not a bit much? cause only KWRocketry is the mod with many parts, when I delete KWRocketry there is only a decrease of around 250mb ram, so i'm wondering which mod is eating my ram?

Ofcourse nobody really cares ram anymore since it is 64 bits right now but last week since I installed and updated some mods (I do this manually), there is a really big increase of RAM which gives my game some instability (game stopped working) and my computer is blowing its fans like a jet engine while normally my computer is pretty quiet.

I hope someone knows a suggestion. Many thanks!

EDIT: I have actually no idea if I posted this in the right category on the forum.

Edited May 3, 2016 by onlinegamesz
You have EnvironmentalVisual installed as well which can be/was quite ram heavy.
Thanks for your respond, I removed both environmentalvisual and kwrocketry, weird enough it still gives a high ram, maybe some plugin is sucking temporary ram the whole time?
